titles.title: Medicare Part D Deadline Equality Act of 2006

To provide for the same treatment of all individuals notified of possible qualification for low-income subsidies for purposes of enrollment and the waiver of late enrollment penalties under the Medicare part D program.
Medicare Part D Deadline Equality Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Medicare Part D Deadline Equality Act of 2006 - Provides that any special enrollment period for 2006 established under Medicare part D (Voluntary Prescription Drug Benefit Program) under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for subsidy-eligible individuals, and any waiver of a late enrollment penalty applicable to such individuals, shall apply to all notified part D eligible individuals without regard to whether or not they are subsidy-eligible individuals.
